Heal the target for a small amount of HP. It can also deal damage to the undead.

Royal: Level 10 
Mage: Level 4 
Elf: Level 8 
Knight: Level 20 
Dark Elf: Level 15.

Mage: Level 4 
Elf: Level 8 
Knight: Level 10

Mage: Level 4 
Elf: Level 8

Royal: Level 10 
Mage: Level 4 
Elf: Level 8 
Knight: Level 50 
Dark Elf:Level 15.

Learning requirement: 
Mage: Level 28.

Deal damage on the target with the possibility of freezing them. When frozen, the target cannot be attacked and cannot move. Success Rate depend on self INT and target freeze resistance. 

 Learning requirement: 
 Mage: Level 28

Summon monsters which can help to assist you upon casting this spell. The number of monster summoned depends on the points of your charisma whereas your Level  affects the type of monsters summoned. You can only summon one monster each time if you already have a monster accompany or the 15 seconds after your last accompany disappear. Or you will summon the upper limit monsters in once with the corresponding magic gems. You can not use this spell under Lv28. Casting this spell will cause your Lawful value to decrease by 10. 

Learning requirement: 
Mage: Level 28

Empower the spell caster's own feet to increase movement speed. 

Learning requirement: 
Mage: Level 28.

Summon a strong whirlwin, causing great damage to the target and the enemies within 2 units range. Turn Pk mode on, to cast on other players. 

Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 28

Increase spell caster’s speed by 50% for 10 mins. Cannot be stacked. 

Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 28

Increase melee attack of your team members, clan members and yourself by 5 points. However, your AC will decrease by 10 points and will not be affected by spells that can help you to recover HP. 

Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 28

Use magic to make your enemy turn ill. Have a chance to reduce your enemy AC by 12 points and accuracy rate by 6 points. Casting this spell will reduce your Lawful value by 10. Success Rate depend on self INT and target MR.

Cast a spell of curse. For a period of time, your attacks have a chance to cause Weakness effect to the target for 4 seconds. 
Only can be used when gauntlets are equipped.
Weakness effect: Reduce 10% caused physic damage.

Dark Elf: Level 45, awaken Curse

Cast a spell of curse. For a period of time, your attacks have a chance to cause Bleeding effect to the target for 4 seconds. 
Only can be used when gauntlets are equipped. 
Bleeding Effect: Losing 3% of the max HP for every 2 seconds. 
Learning Requirement: 
Dark Elf: Level 60, awaken Curse

Cast a spell of curse. For a period of time, your attacks have a chance to cause Lost Soul to the target for 4 seconds. Inapplicable to NPCs. 
Only can be used when Gauntlets are equipped.
Lost Soul: Character can only move, and can not attack, cast spell, or use items.
Learning Requirement: 
Dark Elf: Level 60, awaken Curse

Attacking enemies with the power of resonance of the weapon. Have a chance to attack with double power when attacking. 
You need to equip double blades or claws in order to cast this spell.

You need to equip double blades or claws in order to cast this spell.

Smite a target in front of your character and deal damage. 
Only can be used when melee weapons are equipped. Increase the effective range to 2 units when a spear is equipped. Has a chance to make a critical hit, dealing extra damage based on your weapon damage. When your Con reaches 9, and the higher the Con, the higher the extra damage dealt. 

Learning Requirement: 
Knight: Level 50

Dealing damage to all targets within melee range in 1 unit. 
Only can be used when melee weapons are equipped. Increase the effective range to 2 units when a spear is equipped. Has a chance to make a critical hit, dealing extra damage based on your weapon damage. When your Con reaches 9, and the higher the Con, the higher the extra damage dealt. You can have MP cost reduced when your STR points reach 23, depending on the higher one of STR or INT. The effect cannot be stacked.  

Learning Requirement: 
Knight: Level 60

Strike a target in front of your character and deal damage. 
Only can be used when melee weapons are equipped. Increase the effective range to 2 units when a spear is equipped. Has a chance to make a critical hit, dealing extra damage based on your weapon damage. When your Con reaches 9, and the higher the Con, the higher the extra damage dealt. 

Learning Requirement: 
Royal: Level 50

Dealing damage to all targets within melee range in 1 unit. 
Only can be used when melee weapons are equipped. Increase the effective range to 2 units when a spear is equipped. Has a chance to make a critical hit, dealing extra damage based on your weapon damage. When your Con reaches 9, and the higher the Con, the higher the extra damage dealt. You can have MP cost reduced when your STR points reach 23, depending on the higher one of STR or INT. The effect cannot be stacked.  

Learning Requirement: 
Royal: Level 50

让目标点燃，持续受到火属性伤害。
点燃效果：每秒钟收到41点火属性伤害，持续10秒。其造成的火属性伤害不会受到目标的魔法防御或魔伤减免影响，但会受到目标的火元素抗性影响。
学习要求：
法师：32级

对目标造成伤害且有机率冻结目标。
冻结效果：不能移动、攻击或使用道具，但受到物理伤害和魔法伤害-15，除了魔法相消术之外，不会被其他负面魔法命中。
学习要求：
法师：28级
有一定机率使目标在持续时间内治疗量减半（只影响魔法治疗量以及药水治疗的效果，不影响自身回血效果）\n学习要求：\n精灵：50级

施放一个小型的魔法能量箭，对目标造成少量伤害。 
学习要求：
法师：4级
精灵：8级
王族：10级
骑士：50级\

施放出圣洁的光辉驱散负面状态，解除目标身上的中毒、麻痹、石化的负面效果[变形附带的负面效果不可消除]。
学习要求：
法师：20级
精灵：40级

有一定的机率使邪恶系怪物立即毙命，超度失败则怪物增加移速。成功率与自身智力和目标魔法防御有关。
学习要求：
法师：12级
精灵：24级
持续4秒，持续时间内降低20点魔防并提高2倍命中抵抗，若自身有二段加速效果，则提高2倍命中抵抗。命中抵抗的增益效果仅对PVP有效。\n学习要求：\n精灵：50级
有一定机率使目标在一段时间内石化。石化后的目标无法攻击、移动、使用魔法或者物品。被石化的目标受到的物理和魔法伤害会减少。成功率与双方等级差有关。\n学习要求：\n精灵：40级
